deposit.amount_confirm: Please confirm {type} Wallet balance is enough to cover payment {amount} and fee for the miner
deposit.check_available: Before depositing users are to confirm the available assets(some assets like DABT have frozen amounts). Note also the influence of asset display accuracy ( For example, ETH wallet may show 573 JCCs, while it's 572.99 JCC). So reserve some assets
deposit.confirm_order_status: Please copy transaction hash to facilitate order status query in the {chain} block.
deposit.eth_limit: Before depositing make sure there's 0.02ETH minimum in the ETH wallet(Threshold for processing smart contracts across chains). Actual gas is consumed according to current network conditions.
deposit.failed: Deposit failed, the network may be congested or the balance maybe insufficient. Please try again later！
deposit.input_password: For your account security, please enter the password
deposit.max_limit: The charge limit for the deposit is less than 10 million(excluding 10 million)
deposit.minimum_value: Amount to deposit should not be less than {min}
deposit.moac_limit: Before depositing make sure there's 0.1MOAC minimum in the wallet (Threshold for processing smart contracts across chains). Actual gas is consumed according to current network conditions.
deposit.more_than_available_balance: Balance：{balance}, please check if there is enough assets！
deposit.more_than_zero: Amount to deposit should be bigger than 0
deposit.need_activate: The current SWTC wallet is not activated yet, please send in 35 SWTC to activate wallet.
deposit.previous_deposit_not_finish: The previous deposit process is not over yet, no new deposit is accepted. Please wait！
deposit.request_agent_info_failed: Failed to obtain merchant's infomation, please refresh and try again!
deposit.request_config_failed: Failure to obtain deposit settings, please refresh page!
deposit.succeeded: Deposit is submitted, please wait for smart contract processing
deposit.title: Deposit {coin}
deposit.xrp_limit: Please ensure that Ripple Wallet retains 20 XRP before transferring

password_management.for_account_secure: to ensure your account security, please input @:message.password_management.trade_password
password_management.for_asset_secure: to ensure your funds security, please input @:message.password_management.trade_password
password_management.limit: @:message.password_management.trade_password 8-64 uppercase letters, lowercase letters and numbers

test.info4: Though you  don't score ful marks this time, you can make it next time based on the prompts.

eighth.title: 8.Which of the following loss by the customer is at the cost of WeiDEX?
eighth.topicA: A.Wrong trading due to WeiDEX system fault
eighth.topicB: B.Financial loss due to loss of user's wallet key
eighth.topicC: C.Financial loss caused by user's misoperation
eighth.topicD: D.User's inability to trade due to WeiDEX system fault caused by bad weather

eleventh.title: 11.Which of the following will not result in WeiDEX login without a wallet?

fifteenth.title: 15.What to do when wallet key is leaked?
fifteenth.topicB: B.Transfer assets out from the wallet and leave it desolate

fifth.title: 5.What to do when forgetting trading passwords?
fifth.topicB: B.Click 'Add wallet', then input original wallet address and key to reset trading password
fifth.topicC: C.Contact customer service to assist password reset
fifth.topicD: D.No need to keep trading password. It is auto-saved on the website.

first.title: 1.What is the blockchain in the virtual currency field?
first.topicD: D.Timestamp books that record all virtual currency transactions

fourteenth.title: 14.What are the deposit and withdrawal WeiDEX provides?

fourth.title: 4.Which of the following services WeiDEX does not provide?

ninth.title: 9.Which trading mechanism does WeiDEX platform adopt?

second.title: 2．What is wallet key?
second.topicC: C.Wallet key: A string that accesses ownership of digital assets

seventh.title: 7.What to do when key is lost?
seventh.topicB: B.No way to get it back. Wallet key is only for the user to keep
seventh.topicC: C.Contact customer service to assist password reset
seventh.topicD: D.No need to keep the key. It is auto-saved on the website.

sixth.title: 6.Which of the following operations is available only by real name?

tenth.title: 10.Which of the following can lead to successful UST deposit?
tenth.topicA: A.Submit deposit request - waiting for the account to receive assets
tenth.topicB: B.Submit deposit request - make transfer as specified - waiting for the account to receive assets
tenth.topicC: C.Find customer service to deposit UST
tenth.topicD: D.Submit deposit request - make transfer - waiting for the account to receive assets

third.title: 3.What's the most secure way to keep wallet keys?
third.topicB: B.Send to QQ, Wechat, Weibo or other software

twelfth.title: 12.Which of the following saves the most important content of a wallet?

withdraw.confirm_order_status: Please copy the wallet address to facilitate order status query in the {chain} block.
withdraw.max_limit: The charge limit for the withdraw is less than 10 million(excluding 10 million)
withdraw.minimum_value: Withdrawl amount is not less than {min}
withdraw.request_agent_info_failed: Failed to obtain merchant data, please refresh and try again!
withdraw.request_config_failed: Failed to obtain withdrawal settings, please refresh page!
withdraw.title: Withdraw {token}
withdraw.withdraw_xrp_failed: Ripple wallet is not activated or the network is abnormal. Please check and try again.
